a.title: Photo collage of schools and students

img.alt: Photo collage of schools and students

a.title: Photo collage of schools and students

img.alt: Photo collage of schools and students

p.span: On March 26, Governor Kay Ivey announced that Alabama schools will remain closed and transition students to at-home instruction for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. This latest decision was made due to continued concerns for the health of our communities in light of the COVID-19 pandemic.

br.span: Pelham City Schools will be distributing a 5-day supply of breakfast and lunch meals on Mondays from 10 am - 12 pm at Pelham Park Middle School. This program is available for children ages 18 or younger. Please review the requirements for pick up here.
At-home learning began on Monday, April 6. Visit the

a.title: At-Home Learning page
a.style: color: rgb(0, 132, 61); font-weight: bold; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px;

br.span: for resources and details about what to expect. You can also view the Technology Resources page for access to information and tips about the online platforms and tools your student will be using.

br.br: Visit the COVID-19 page for important updates and information.

p.span:
In order to comply with Alabama’s stay at home order, and due to the COVID-19 pandemic, The Pelham Board of Education will be utilizing video technology to hold its April 27, 2020, Work Session at 2:00 pm. The Work Session will not be live streamed, but a summary will be provided to the public no less than twelve hours after the meeting has been adjourned.
The Pelham Board of Education will be utilizing video technology to hold its April 27, 2020, Board Meeting. The meeting will be live streamed via YouTube at 6:30 p.m. central time. Please use the link below to view this meeting at https://youtu.be/MTXzFFahuMM. A summary of the board meeting will be provided to the public no less than twelve hours after the meeting has been adjourned. (Posted 4.19.2020)

span.style: background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); font-family: Tahoma; color: black;

div.style: color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

h2.style: font-size: 28px; font-family: source_sans_probold; font-weight: normal; margin: 10px 0px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span:
The mission of Pelham City Schools is to collaborate with parents and community to inspire and empower students to achieve personal success.
We are innovative, rigorous, and engaging.
We are committed to achievement.
We are invested in our students.
We are a community of learners.
We inspire. We empower. We achieve.

span.br: The financial, student achievement, and school safety and discipline reports for Pelham City Schools are available on the Reports & Data section of our website.
